In 2013, with the aim to help her husband, she started her own business, by opening her own shop for selling kids’ toys and furniture with her special selling methods and giving a high quality of products provided. She is well-known in her region with the special talents in her domain, in addition to the customer care she offers. 

Today, Laurette is requesting a third loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l, to increase her business merchandise to meet the needs of her clients in order to increase her income. She is very proud of her business growth and she hopes to enlarge her shop in the future.

loans.use: to increase her kids toys and furniture business stocks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers to increase nutrients in the soil for a better harvest to meet client needs and those of her family.

loans.name: Farishtamo

texts.ru:
Фариштамо считает себя самым счастливым человеком, потому что она замужем на любимого человека и мать прекрасных детей. У Фариштамо имеется маленький продуктовый ларек, где она продает продукты питания. Ей 33 года. Она из района Пяндж. 
   5 лет назад Фариштамо решилась открыть свой продуктовый ларек. Для начала работы являлось ей только средством дохода, чтобы обеспечить семью, но сейчас работа в ларечке это еще любимое занятие. За 5 лет Фариштамо приобрела опыт и постоянных клиентов. Она хочет привести новые продукты и расширит ассортимент товара в ларечке. Для закупа и перевозки продуктов питания потребуются деньги, поэтому Фариштамо обратился за кредитом. Она надеется, что ей помогут. Фариштамо ждет Вашу поддержку!
texts.en:
Farishtamo considers herself to be an extremely happy person because she is married to a loving husband and she is the mother of some beautiful children.  She owns a small grocery store where she sells food products.  She is 33 years old and she comes from the Pyandj district.

She decided to open her shop five years ago.  In the beginning, she only worked to get a source of income which would support her family, but she's grown to love her job and it has become her favorite activity.  In five years, she has gained experience and attracted some regular customers.  She now wants to bring in some new products and increase her shop inventory.  However, she needs money to be able to buy and bring in more goods, which is the reason why she is taking a loan.  She is hoping for a positive outcome and waiting for your support!

loans.use: to bring in food products and increase her shop's inventory.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past three years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. In addition, she also operates a poultry-selling business. She faces the major challenge of transportation in her operation.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Nadzua

texts.en:
Nadzua is a married woman and has four school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food and school fees for the family.

For the past seven years, she has operated a business buying and selling livestock, selling at the market to local neighbours. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and the high cost of transportation in her place of operation. 

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase goats and cows for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase goats and cows for resale

loans.name: Shamsa

texts.en:
Shamsa is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past four years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future.

With the loan that she is requesting of KES 30,000 she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Serah

texts.en:
Serah is a married woman living together with her husband and six children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past six years, she has operated a charcoal selling business. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Sidi

texts.en:
Sidi is a married woman with seven children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither piped water nor electricity.

Sidi has operated a coconut business, selling at the market to her local customers. She dreams of expanding her business in the future.

With the KES 15,000 she wants to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale

loans.name: Delina

texts.en:
Delina is married woman and she has two kids who attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past four years, she has operated a poultry farming business which is her source of income. She sells to restaurant operators and local neighbours. Her major challenge is the high cost of transportation to her place of operation.

With the KES 40,000 she wants to purchase chicken feeds and chicks for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase chicken feeds and chicks for her business

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es:
Jhon, un campesino muy amoroso y de gran pasión por la naturaleza, trabaja con animales, pero no sacrificándolos ni vendiéndolos solamente, trabaja con la leche de las vacas; es tanta la admiración y respeto por los animales que prefiere que mueran por vejez antes de tener que sacrificarles para conseguir una rentabilidad por su carne. 

Es padre de 3 hijos, trabaja con ellos enseñándoles la pasión por el campo, por amar la naturaleza y el amor por los animales. 

Pensando en su vivienda y en sus hijos, el señor Jhon quiere expandirse y por tal motivo tiene un dinero juntado para comprar una vaca lechera por lo que requiere un crédito para ajustar el total del dinero para la compra de la vaca. 

Con la ayuda de esta vaca tendrá más producción lechera garantizando una vida económica estable para el futuro de él, su esposa y sus hijos. 

Sueña con tener una finca con mucho ganado rodearse de estos mamíferos que le ayudan a llevar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Jhon, a very loving farmer with a great passion for nature, works with animals, but not butchering them nor only selling them. He works with cow milk. Such is his admiration and respect for these animals that he would rather them die of old age than to butcher them and make a profit off their meat.

He is the father of 3 children. He works with them, teaching them to have a passion for the fields, and to love nature and animals.

Thinking of his home and his children, Mr. Jhon wishes to expand. For this reason he has saved some money to buy a dairy cow, and requests a loan so that he can complete the total amount needed to purchase it.

With the help of this cow, he will have a greater milk production, guaranteeing a stable economic situation for his future, and that of his wife and children.

He dreams of having a property filled with a lot of cattle, so he can surround himself with these mammals that help him provide sustenance for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow so he can increase his milk production.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a rental house that has electricity and piped water.

She has operated a retail shop for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of debtors taking too long to repay for goods taken on credit. 

With the loan she is requesting, she would like to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Clemence

texts.en:
Clemence is a married woman with two children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop for the past five years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of debtors taking too long to repay for goods taken on credit. 

With the loan she is requesting, she would like to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: John Bosco

texts.en:
John Bosco is a resident of Kifuuta, Kabila in Rakai district, and married with three children, all attending school and he takes care of his grandmother. He carries out a business of videography and photography, which he started in 2009, and as well farming where he grows passion fruits with the aim of improving on his daily income. He works the 6 days of the week and 10 hours per day. 

He wants a loan of UGX 3,000,000 to buy stock of printing paper and cartridge for his business. He is saying that his clients are residents and people from the surrounding areas, especially those from Kampala.

John Bosco has an aim of having a bigger shop in a busier center.  However, his challenges are lack of enough capital, seasonal changes, and competition. He describes himself as an honest and hardworking man encouraging lenders to always continue.

loans.use: to buy printing paper and printer toner.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia Gregoria se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de jugos, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar manzanas,mandarinas, naranjas y uvas.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Communal bank member Gregoria continues working in the business of selling juices. Through this business she wants to raise her family. She is applying for the loan to buy apples, tangerines, oranges, and grapes.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make the payments on her account.

loans.use: to buy apples, tangerines, oranges, and grapes

loans.name: Habiba

texts.en: Habiba is a generous woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1972. She is living in a village with her family. She is married and has four children. She has an activity in agriculture and knows her duty well. She plants fruits and vegetables and trades at the domestic market. Her work is not easy. She works on the land at a high temperature and the sun may hit her. What she does to look after her land makes her more tired and flabbiness. But she is a responsible, honest and goal oriented person. Not looking after her illness, she wants to continue her business. In order to feel better she appealed to IMON asking financial support to get a course of therapy in the hospital.

loans.use: to get a course of therapy in the hospital.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a married woman with two kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity, but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Gladys operates a grocery vegetable sales stall; she sells at the market to town-dwellers and neighbors. She faces the challenge of the high cost of transportation to her place of operation.

With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a brick-selling business for the past three years, selling household consumable bricks. She faces major challenges of seasonality and transportation in her place of operation.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase materials to prepare the bricks.

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials to prepare the bricks

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moises de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene 12 años de dedicarse a ese trabajo y gracias a ello es como ha podido salir adelante, la época de mas cultivo es en marzo y septiembre, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, entre otros insumos para poder continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
39-year-old Moises lives in a house he owns with his wife and their four children. He makes a living by growing corn. He has 12 years of experience in this area, and thanks to the work, he has been able to get ahead. The best growing season is in March and September.

He is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, manure, and other supplies in order to continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, and other supplies

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Всегда приятно, если человек занимается тем делом что приносит удовольствие. Махбуба из города Турсунзаде. Ей 56 лет. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Ее муж занимается таксистом. Махбуба шьет женские национальные платья около 19 лет. В день она успевает шить одно простое платье, несмотря на то, что ей надо вести хозяйство. Ей нравится сшить разную и красивую одежду для женщин и девушек. Но она на все успевает. Она хочет получить в займы для покупки многофункциональную машинку для шитья, потому что она старую машинку несколько раз отремонтировала. Ей не выгодна, сшить на старом машинке.
texts.en: It is always nice to meet someone who truly enjoys her work... Mahbuba is from Tursunzoda.  She is 56 years old and the mother of three children.  Her husband works as a taxi driver.  Mahbuba has been sewing women's traditional dresses for about 19 years.  She makes sure that she sews one simple dress per day no matter how many household chores she has to take care of.  She loves to sew various beautiful outfits for girls and women and she manages to do everything very well.  She wants to receive a loan to buy a multi-function sewing machine, because she has already repaired her old machine several times and because her business could be more profitable with a newer machine.

loans.use: to buy a multi-function sewing machine.

loans.name: Beatriz Petrona

texts.es:
Beatriz es una mujer de 29 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijas mujeres de 8 meses y de 5 años, y su negocio es el transporte de material de construcción.
Ella es buena madre, independiente, emprendedora, generosa, paciente, constante, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en los ríos ‘kalajahuira’ (rio de piedras) y ‘Chuquiaguillo’ ubicados al noroeste de la ciudad, se caracteriza por cobijar a artesanos, fabricantes de colchones de paja y talleres de tejido de mantas, también existe la cría de camélidos y muchas familias se dedican al recojo de piedras para posteriormente comercializarlas. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-14 grados centígrados.
Beatriz es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, viste de forma tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que desarrolla. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja como arenero y con sus hijas que aún no se encuentran en edad escolar, viven en un cuarto propio construida de adobe, ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con energía eléctrica, no cuenta con agua potable ni alcantarillado. Su negocio es la extracción de Piedra, tierra, arena, grava, para la construcción. La materia prima empleada es muy abundante, El transporte a largas distancias, es lo que más encarece el precio de los materiales de construcción, “extraemos piedra, lavamos arena, nos ocupamos del transporte de todo tipo de material de construcción…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con empresas como clientes continuos, la desventaja es la falta de capital para el mantenimiento del camión. Su sueño es trabajar con seguridad, ella desea realizar el mantenimiento a su camión mediante el cambio de llantas. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que desarrolla esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Beatriz solicita un préstamo para cambiar las llantas a su camión arenero para trabajar con seguridad.
texts.en:
Beatriz, age 29, lives with her life partner.  She has two daughters, ages eight months and five years old.  Her business is the transportation of construction materials.  She is a good mother.  She is independent, enterprising, generous, patient, steadfast, responsible, and very hard-working.  She conducts her business on the Kalajahuira River (river of rocks) and the Chuquiaguillo River, which are located northeast of the city.  It is known for sheltering artisans, people who make straw mattresses, and blanket weaving workshops.  People here also raise camelids, and many families gather rocks to later sell.  The climate is cold and dry with a temperature that varies during the day between 2 and 14 degrees centigrade.

Beatriz has a dark complexion, brown eyes, and long black hair that she braids.  She is short and thin.  She wears traditional clothes (hat, shawl, and skirt).  Her mother tongue is Aymará, which she speaks with her family.  She speaks Spanish with the general public and for her business.  She shares her life with her life partner, who works as a sand merchant, and with her daughters, who are not yet school age.  They live in their own room build of adobe, brick, and cement.  The roof is corrugated metal, and the floor is wood.  They have electricity, but they do not have running water or indoor plumbing.

Her business is extracting rocks, dirt, sand, and gravel for construction.  The raw material used is very abundant.  Transporting it long distances is what raises the price of the construction material.  “We extract rocks, wash sand, and transport all types of construction materials,” she says.  The advantage of her business is that she has companies that are ongoing customers.  The disadvantage is the lack of capital for maintenance on the truck.

Her dream is to work safely.  She wishes to provide maintenance on her truck by changing the tires.  This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the three years that she has engaged in this business activity independently.

It is for these reasons that Beatriz requests a loan to change the tires of her sand-hauling truck in order to work safely.

loans.use: to change the tires on her sand-hauling truck in order to work more safely.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de preparacion de tortas,la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora qur por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos para preparar la torta como huevos,mantequilla y harina.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower continues working in her business making cakes. She is a hard-working woman who, through this business, wants to move her family ahead.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies to make cakes, such as eggs, butter, and flour. She is happy with the loan and promises to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make cakes, such as eggs, butter, and flour

loans.name: Mayeanie

texts.en: This is 46 year-old Mayeanie. She is married and has two children, aged thirteen and eight years. In 2012, Mayeanie established her clothing business. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are women. Working six days a week and nine hours a day, she earns about 3,000,000 SLL every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL. Mayeanie requires a loan in order to buy more ladies wear to sell, such as bodysuits, skirts, jeans, tights, etc. She hopes that this loan will help her to buy more recent stock and generate more profit. In the future, Mayeanie plans to add children’s wear to the business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more ladies wear to sell, such as bodysuits, skirts, jeans, etc.

loans.name: Jessica Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda es una joven de 21 años de edad, Yolanda está casada y tiene 2 hijos, uno de 2 años y otro de 5 años. El esposo de Yolanda se dedica a trabajar al jornal de trabajos de agricultura. Yolanda anteriormente se dedicaba al jornal, pero en la actualidad  está embarazada y se dedica a la crianza de animales menores. Yolanda solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos. Yolanda espera  mejorar su negocio, comprar mas chanchos, tener bunas ganancias y  asi salir adelante con sus hijos, sobre todo para que ellos estudien.
texts.en:
Yolanda, age 21, is married and has two children.  One of them is two years old, and the other is five years old.  Yolanda’s husband works as an agricultural day worker.  Yolanda previously worked as a day worker, but she is now pregnant and devotes herself to raising small animals.

Yolanda is requesting the loan to buy pigs.  Yolanda hopes to improve her business, to buy more pigs, to have good earnings, and to get ahead with her children.  Most importantly she wants them to get an education.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Salima

texts.en:
Salima is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past one year, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of creditors taking too long to repay for goods taken on credit. 

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Nuvia Del Carmen

texts.es: Nuvia es una joven trabajadora de 28 años de edad, Nuvia está casada y tiene una hija de 2 años y un hijo de 8 años de edad. Su hijo esta estudiando y su esposo trabaja al jornal. Nuvia es una señora colombiana que vive ya 4 años en Ecuador y comenta que de lo único que encontró trabajo es de jornalera de actividades de agricultura, pero esta contenta con este trabajo ya que es asi que puede ganar dinero para cubrir las necesidades de sus hijos. Nuvia también se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores y comenta que le va bien en este negocio. Nuvia solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos. Nuvia tiene su meta propuesta que es la de sacar adelante a sus hijos y sobre todo que estudien para que tengan un buen futuro.
texts.en:
Nuvia, age 28, is a hard-working young woman.  Nuvia is married and has a two year old daughter and an eight year old son.  Her son goes to school, and her husband is a day worker.  Nuvia is from Colombia, and she has lived in Ecuador for four years.  She says that the only work she found was as an agricultural day worker.  However, she is happy with this work because this way she is able to earn money to cover her children’s necessities.  Nuvia also raises small animals.  She says it is going well for her in this business.

Nuvia is requesting the loan to buy pigs.  Nuvia’s goal is to get her children ahead and, most importantly, for them to go to school in order to have a good future.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy quarry stones, iron, cement, glazed tile, glue, pipes, and showers in order to build a bathroom beside the well that provides water through the pipes she will install.

loans.name: José Pablo

texts.es: José de 54 años es un habitante del municipio de Puerto Colombia, situado en el Departamento del Atlántico con cercanía al mar e influencia turística. Desde muy joven comercializó frutas y compraba las que estaban en cosecha según la época del año para obtener mayores ingresos, hoy en día cuenta con 25 años de experiencia en la venta de frutas y carne cerdo, todos los días a partir de las 8 a.m. hasta las 9 p.m. sale a las calles donde ofrece a los transeúntes del lugar sus productos. Sus compras las genera en el mercado público de Barranquilla y cancela de contado, así mismo sus ventas las cancelan inmediatamente, pero a algunos clientes fieles les ofrece comodidad de pago. Actualmente está aplicando a su primer Credikiva con el que planea comprar fruta al por mayor; mango, ciruela, aguacates y también carne de cerdo.  Esta inversión permitirá dinamizar las ventas puesto que son productos necesarios para una dieta balanceada y lo mejor es que son exquisitos.  José es padre de tres hijos a quienes continuará educando hasta que sean independientes y puedan ejercer alguna profesión.  Su meta es continuar ofreciendo la mejor carne de cerdo y frutas frescas a todos los porteños.
texts.en:
José, age 54, lives in the Puerto Colombia municipality, which is in the Atlántico department close to the sea and to tourist activity.  Ever since he was very young he has sold fruit and bought the fruit from seasonal harvests in order to get greater earnings.  Nowadays he has 25 years of experience selling fruit and pork.  Every day from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. he goes to the streets to sell his products to the passersby .  He makes his purchases at the Barranquilla public market, and he pays in cash.  His sales are paid for at the time of sale, but he offers some loyal customers credit.

He is now applying for his first Kiva loan.  He plans to use the loan to buy fruit wholesale.  He will buy mangoes, plums, and avocados.  He will also buy pork.  This investment will allow him to make more dynamic sales given that these products are needed for a balanced diet.  The best part is that they are exquisite.  

José has three children who he will continue educating until they become independent and can practice some profession.  His goal is to continue selling the best pork and fresh fruits to all of the port residents.

loans.use: to buy mangoes, plums, avocados, and pork wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more retail goods for sale in the market to gain more income.

loans.name: Sanamkan

texts.ru: Санамкан, 44 года, замужем, 2 детей. Санамкан в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад с 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду, Санамкан на сегодняшний день имеет: 2 коровы, также есть 0,15 Га земли, где она выращивает органический картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет примерно 6,800 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Санамкан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) для покупки семян картофеля. Санамкан намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита она хочет вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины и постройку нового дома.
texts.en: Sanamkan is 44 years old, married, and she has two children.  She is involved in agriculture and animal husbandry, two activities which constitute her family's main source of income.  She started in this field 10 years ago with an initial capital of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has two cows on her farm, as well as 0.15 hectares of land on which she grows organic potatoes.  She makes a monthly income of about 6,800 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, Sanamkan has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to buy potato seeds.  She intends to get a good harvest, which will directly lead to an increase of her family's capital.  She wants to use the earnings from her loan to increase her number of domestic animals and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase seeds in order to grow organic potatoes.

loans.name: Secundino De Jesús

texts.es:
Secundino de 56 años de edad,  se dedica a realizar  trabajos de estructuras metálicas en su comunidad desde que era pequeño, oficio que aprendió de un buen amigo, así ha obteniendo su trabajo estable, además los fines de semana se dedica a la agricultura y comparte tiempo con su familia.

El  dinero será utilizado para comprar materiales de estructuras metálicas ya que se le ha presentado un proyecto, también comprará fertilizantes y otros insumos agrícolas.

Secundino espera inculcarles principios morales a sus hijos, realizar un nuevo préstamo para la ampliación del taller y comprar maquinaria.
texts.en:
Secundino is 56 years old and has made a living working with metal structures in the community since he was young. He learned this trade from a good friend, and has obtained stable work. Also on the weekends he works in agriculture and shares time with his family.

The money will be used to purchase materials and metal structures since he started a project, and also to buy fertilizers and other agricultural supplies.

Secundino hopes to instill moral principals in his children and make a new loan for the expansion of his shop and to buy machinery.

loans.use: to buy materials and metal structures since he started a project, and additionally to buy fertilizers and other agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Luz De Maria

texts.es: Luz tiene 28 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora que hace 3 años logro adquirir un terreno en el que construyo su vivienda con el apoyo de su esposo con el que vive al lado de sus dos hijos que son su mayor alegría. Luz se dedica desde hace varios años a enseñar sus conocimientos como maestra en una institución pública, por lo que se siente muy feliz de ejercer su profesión que tanto le apasiona. Luz desea mejorar su vivienda, ya que por falta de liquidez económica solo logro construir una sola área en su vivienda, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir divisiones en su vivienda y brindar una mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Luz, age 28, is a hard-working woman.  Three years ago she managed to get some land upon which she built her house with the support of her husband.  She lives with her husband and their two children, who are her greatest joy.

Luz has been teaching at a public institution for several years.  She is very happy to practice this profession that she is so passionate about.

Luz wishes to improve her home.  Due to the lack of financial liquidity, she only managed to build one area of her house.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to build divisions in her house and to make her family more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to build divisions in her house.

loans.name: Edith Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda es una joven  de 33 años  edad, ella es madre soltera, Yolanda  tiene 3 hijas de 6, 8 y 11 años de edad y ellas están estudiando, Yolanda se dedica a la crianza de ganado y al jornal de trabajos de agricultura, Yolanda solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de terneros. Yolanda cria sus terneros y los vende cuando ya están grandes y gordos para obtener ganancias. Yolanda tiene la aspiración de mejorar su negocio y asi luchar por el bienestar de sus hijos y sobre todo para que sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Yolanda, age 33, is a single mother.  Yolanda has three daughters, ages 6, 8, and 11.  They go to school.

Yolanda raises livestock and is an agricultural day worker.

Yolanda is requesting the loan to buy calves.  Yolanda raises her calves and sells them when they are big and fat in order to get profits.

Yolanda wants to improve her business.  This way she will struggle for her children’s well-being and, above all, she will do this so that they will continue going to school.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Heidin Adriana

texts.es: En el municipio de Tubará se encuentra ubicado el taller de confecciones de Heidin,  ofreciendo a sus clientes diseños y costuras de prendas de vestir de uso casual e informal.  Su suegra quien también es confeccionista le enseño este arte por medio del cual ella inició su microempresa y hoy en día genera recursos para su familia desde la comodidad de su hogar.  Ella es madre de dos hijos menores de edad a quienes ofrece el tiempo necesario para su cuidado y planifica su trabajo de acuerdo a sus obligaciones en el hogar.   Todos los días a partir de las 7 a.m. hasta las 7 p.m. está disponible para sus clientes que deseen ropa a su medida, con diseños modernos, cómodos y exclusivos. Actualmente está aplicando a su primer Credikiva con el que planea comprar materias primas, telas, hilos y accesorios.  Esta inversión pretende responder oportunamente a la demanda de sus clientes. Su meta a nivel personal es remodelar su vivienda y ver crecer su negocio para contratar operarias.
texts.en:
Heidin’s seamstress shop is located in the Tubará municipality.  She offers her customers designs and casual and informal garments.  Her mother-in-law, who is also a seamstress, taught her this art that she used to started her small business.  She now generates resources for her family from the comfort of her home.

She has two minor children to whom she can provide the time needed for their care.  She plans her work according to her household obligations.  She is available to her customers who want custom clothes with modern, comfortable and exclusive designs every day from 7:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  

She is applying for her first Kiva loan to buy raw material, fabric, thread, and accessories.  This investment is intended to respond in a timely way to her customers’ demand.  Her personal goal is to remodel her house and to see her business grow in order to hire workers.

loans.use: to buy raw material, fabric, thread, and accessories.

loans.name: Blanca Adilia

texts.es:
Blanca, de 44 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, ella no  trabaja ella solo apoya a su pareja en la agricultura y hace los oficios en su casa.- Blanca, tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, pero un hijo ya se acompañó y vive en una casa aparte, con blanca solo vive su pareja, dos hijos y una nuera.

Blanca, se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde hace 11 años, con el apoyo de su compañero de vida, este trabajo ella lo aprendió de sus padres, quienes desde siempre han cultivado y de eso han salido adelante. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes y pesticidas para preparar el terreno donde van a cultivar este año, con la ayuda del préstamo ya no estará preocupada porque ahorita no cuentan con el dinero para comprar los insumos y ya estamos a pocos días que inicie la época lluviosa.

Sus sueños son tener salud siempre para ayudarle a su compañero de vida a sembrar y algún dia poco a poco mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
44-year-old Blanca went to school until sixth grade. She has a life partner, who works in farming. She doesn't work; she only supports her partner in his farming and works around the house. Blanca has three children who are all adults, but one of them already has a partner and lives in his own house. Only her husband, two children and her daughter-in-law live with Blanca.

Blanca has been working in agriculture for the last 11 years, with her partner's support. She learned the work from her parents, who have always been farmers and with that have been able to get ahead. 

She needs the loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides to prepare the soil where they are going to plant this year. With the help of the loan, she won't be worried anymore because right now they don't have the money to buy supplies, and we are already only a few days away from the start of the rainy season.

Her dreams are to always be healthy, in order to help her life partner to plan and to one day, little by little, improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pesticides to prepare the soil where they are going to plant this year

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es: Doña Leonor de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos desde hace 4 años, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, también se dedica a la venta de medicina popular desde hace 20 años, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito pero en esta ocasión es para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plaga, herbicidas, fertilizantes, etc. y asi seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Doña Leonor, who is 56 years old, lives in her own house with her family group. She has been planting basic grains for four years. She sells her products in the areas surrounding the zone where she lives. She has also been selling traditional medicines for 20 years. With the sales that she makes, she manages to pay some of her household expenses.

She is applying for a loan, but at this time it is for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, fertilizers, etc., to thus continue with her work, which generates a good income for her.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to provide maintenance and to buy new equipment that will allow her to provide better service.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, and vanity items.

loans.name: Antonio Heriberto

texts.es: Don antonio de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos desde hace 15 años y también trabaja como albañil desde hace 30 años, gracias a su trabajo es como el ha podido salir adelante, el quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo y repellando las paredes, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón, solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, laminas, polines entre otros materiales y asi poder tener una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Don Antonio, who is 54 years old, lives in his own house with his life companion and their two children. He has been raising basic grains for 15 years, and he has also worked as a mason for 30 years. Thanks to his work, this is how he has been able to get ahead.

He wants to improve his house by replacing the roof and plastering the walls, but what he obtains from his work doesn't go far enough to do this. For this reason, he is applying for a loan to buy cement, sand, metal sheeting, and purlins, among other items, and thus he will be able to have a dignified home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, metal sheeting, and purlins, among other materials

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
La socia  Ubaldina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia hace platos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate Ubaldina continues working in the business of selling food. The associate wants to move forward, using this business. The associate makes dishes like grilled chicken and soups, among others. The associate’s dream is to expand her business selling food. The associate requests the loan to buy vegetables, chicken and meat.

The associate is happy for the loan and committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
La ciudad de Manta es considerada el balneario más importante, popular y visitado del Ecuador por sus hermosas y acogedoras playas, primer puerto de aguas profundas del Ecuador y sur América.
En este lugar vive la señora Dolores, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 5 hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es pescador.
Doña Dolores es una mujer muy luchadora que para ayudar con los gastos del hogar tiene un negocio de venta de helados y colas en su casa,  ella prepara los helados y sus helados caseros son únicos. Trabaja todos los días desde las 10h00 hasta las 20H00 de Lunes a Domingos y días feriados, trabaja sola y son cuatro años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar leche, azúcar, paletas de madera para helados  y otros ingredientes para la preparación de los helados. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 5 ciclos y le gusta porque los intereses son bajos. Su sueño es seguir elaborando sus helados y que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
The city of Manta is considered to be the most important and popular seaside resort town in Ecuador because of its beautiful, friendly beaches. It was the first deep sea port in Ecuador and South America. 

This is where Dolores, age 51, lives.  She is married, and they have five grown and independent children.  Her husband is a fisherman.

Dolores is a very tenacious woman.  In order to help with the household expenses she has a business selling ice cream and colas at her house.  She prepares the ice cream, and they are homemade and unique.  She works every day from 10:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. on Mondays through Sundays and holidays.  She works alone.  She has been doing this for four years, and it is going very well for her.

She will use the loan to buy milk, sugar, wooden sticks for the ice cream, and other ingredients for preparing the ice cream.  She has been in her loan group for five years.  She likes it because the interest rates are low.  Her dream is to continue making her ice cream and for her business to grow.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, wooden sticks for the ice cream, and other ingredients for preparing the ice cream.

loans.name: Enma Dolores

texts.es: Enma es una señora de muy buen carácter, Enma está casada con un señor que se dedica  a la ganadería,  agricultura  y al jornal en el campo. Enma tiene un hijo de 15 años y una hija de 7 años, mismos que están estudiando. Enma se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y adicionalmente teje prendas de vestir en lana. Enma solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de cuyes. Enma vive en el campo y comenta que su mayor aspiración es trabajar para que sus hijos sigan estudiando y hasta que lleguen a ser unos profesionales para que tengan un buen futuro.
texts.en:
Enma is a woman of very good character.  She is married to a man who works with livestock, in agriculture, and as a field worker.  Enma has a 15 year old son and a 7 year old daughter.  The children go to school.

Enma raises small animals, and she knits wool clothing.

Enma is requesting a loan to buy guinea pigs.  Enma lives in the country, and she says that her greatest aspiration is to work so that her children continue to go to school until they become professionals in order to have a good future.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Rosa Maribel

texts.es:
Rosa de 28 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar y a la venta de tortillas, tacos y panes con pollo, es una persona muy conocida por su actividad productiva, su familia está formada por su esposo y sus tres hijos de los cuales dos se encuentran estudiando en la escuela de su comunidad mientras que su hijo mayor se dedica ayudar en los trabajos agrícolas a su padre.

Rosa tiene una experiencia de 10 años en realizar esta actividad productiva la cual aprendió de su madre y hoy en día es la principal fuente de ingresos de Rosa.


Este crédito lo necesita para comprar maíz para su negocio, comprará una estufa y también insumos agrícolas para los cultivos de su esposo, de esta forma podrá cubrir sus necesidades de trabajo.


Sus metas a futuro son cancelar crédito y adquirir otro para el mejoramiento de las instalaciones de su negocio, además le gustaría comprar un vehículo para realizar venta de verduras.
texts.en:
Rosa, 28 years old, performs the household chores and works selling tortillas, tacos and chicken sandwiches. She is a very well known person because of her work. Her family consists of her husband and their three children, of which two are studying in their community school while the eldest son helps his father with the farming tasks.

Rosa has 10 years of experience doing this work, which she learned from her mom. Nowadays it is the main source of income for Rosa.

She needs this loan to buy corn for her business. She will buy a stove as well as agricultural supplies for her husband’s crops. In this way, she will be able to cover her work necessities. 

Her future goals are to repay the loan and acquire another for improving her business’s facilities. She would also like to buy a vehicle for selling vegetables.

loans.use: to buy corn for her business. She will buy a stove as well as agricultural supplies for her husband’s crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, iron, quarry rocks, sand, pipes, glazed tiles and other accessories in order to build the drain behind the house and to remodel the bathroom.
